UQTk
====

# Available modules


The overview below shows which UQTk installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using UQTk, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load UQTk/3.1.0-intel-2019b-Python-3.7.4
```
